conbody.p: (b)(3) DFARS 252.228-7001, Ground and Flight Risk Clause, requires the assignment of a Government Flight Representative (GFR) to administer the requirements of the combined instruction Contractor’s Flight and Ground Operations, (DCMA INST 8210.1, AFI 10-220, AR 95-20, NAVAIRINST 3710.1 (Series), and COMDTINST M13020.3). At the time the solicitation is issued, contracting officers shall contact DCMA Aircraft Operations (AO) and the appropriate Military Service to obtain technical advice and allow adequate lead time for assigning a GFR. Make requests for assignment of a GFR to—
Email: AOInbox@dcma.mil (include "Ground and Flight Risk Clause" on the subject line)
Navy: Commander, Naval Air Systems Command (AIR-09F)
